title: Mobile-Based Self-Regulated Learning Enhancement Program: Utilizing PLE for Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience using mobile devices
context.additional_context: Focuses on enhancing self-regulated learning competencies through Personal Learning Environment (PLE) construction, utilizing only smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can establish and implement self-regulated learning plans using mobile devices at least three times per week.
Learners achieve language learning goals at a rate of 80% or higher by utilizing digital learning tools (apps, online resources).
Learners can reflect on their learning and systematically manage artifacts in an e-portfolio.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
